explanations.reinforcement learning: The paper explicitly mentions the use of off-policy reinforcement learning in the proposed Dirichlet Distribution Trader (DDT) algorithm for portfolio management.
explanations.neural network: The paper discusses the architecture of the model, which implies the use of neural networks, although it does not specify the type of neural network used.
explanations.deep learning: Given the mention of neural networks and the scalable architecture of the model, it is reasonable to infer that deep learning techniques are employed, although the paper does not explicitly state this.
